price: Nami sikuwaumba majini na watu ila waniabudu Mimi.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ
footnotes: Wala sikuwaumba majini na watu kwa jambo la kuniletea Mimi manufaa, bali ili waniabudu, na kuniabudu Mimi ni manufaa kwao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
